title: "New food-delivering robots landing in Cambs town"
excerpt: "A growing army of six-wheeled robots could cut traffic jams and improve Cambridgeshire’s air quality, the county’s highways boss has claimed. Councillor Alex Beckett made the observation ahead of today’s (May 17) launch of a new fleet of self-driving food delivery gizmos in Cambourne."
